title: France panorama. [No. 75/09]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Technology: Franco-American engine - a ten ton thrust jet engine. High voltage - working toward the one million volt line for electric networks. 2. Conceptions - novel chair designs. 3. Cities of art - exhibits presented by France’s historic cities and towns. 4. From David to Delacroix - French painting from 1774 to 1830.
